CustomMetadata.label: Issue with the data & MFS Full Failure

values.value: There was an error in creating the MFS Mx affiliate programs and/or Store partnership records. Please refer to the error message for further details and retry in a few minutes. If the issue persists, raise a support ticket - MX Finance board: (https://doordash.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa?pid=13864&issuetype=1&priority=4) and slack on #eng-mx-finance channel : (https://app.slack.com/client/E02180LFT96/CUT5HLH2P).
